content.value:
For the latest role we’re hiring for, I’m sending the interview questions to candidates ahead of time. 

Most roles don’t require working under pressure so why create pressure?

I’d rather use our time to evaluate how folks prepare (arguably a greater skill).
content.html: For the latest role we’re hiring for, I’m sending the interview questions to candidates ahead of time. Most roles don’t require working under pressure so why create pressure? I’d rather use our time to evaluate how folks prepare (arguably a greater skill).
